attractions.name: Metro Downtown Historic District
attractions.description: Step back in time in our beautifully preserved historic district featuring 19th-century architecture, boutique shops, and award-winning restaurants. The cobblestone streets and Victorian-era buildings create a charming atmosphere perfect for business meetings and leisure visits.

attractions.name: Riverside Business Park
attractions.description: A modern business complex featuring state-of-the-art office spaces, conference facilities, and beautiful landscaping along the Metro River. Home to over 50 businesses and offering excellent networking opportunities for chamber members.

attractions.name: Metro Convention Center
attractions.description: Our premier event venue hosts trade shows, conferences, and business exhibitions year-round. With 100,000 square feet of flexible space and cutting-edge technology, it's the perfect location for your next corporate event.

attractions.name: Greenway Nature Preserve
attractions.description: A 500-acre nature preserve offering hiking trails, wildlife viewing, and outdoor team-building opportunities. Many local businesses use this beautiful space for corporate retreats and employee wellness programs.

attractions.name: Metro Arts & Culture Center
attractions.description: A vibrant cultural hub featuring galleries, theaters, and performance spaces. The center hosts business networking events, cultural celebrations, and provides a sophisticated venue for corporate entertainment.

attractions.name: Innovation Technology Hub
attractions.description: A cutting-edge technology incubator supporting startups and established tech companies. Features co-working spaces, research facilities, and regular tech meetups that foster innovation and collaboration in our business community.

attractions.name: Metro Farmers Market
attractions.description: Every Saturday, local farmers and artisans gather to showcase the best of our region's produce and crafts. A popular destination that supports local agriculture and provides fresh, quality ingredients to area restaurants.

attractions.name: Lakeside Recreation Complex
attractions.description: A comprehensive recreation facility featuring sports courts, fitness centers, and meeting rooms overlooking beautiful Metro Lake. Popular for corporate wellness programs, team building events, and business golf tournaments.
